Published 2021

Minus aliquid alias porro iure fuga

Are you looking for a great picture book to read to your little ones or share with your Sunday school class? Maybe you are looking for a book a grandma or grandpa could read to grandchildren. Even your young teens will find it fun to read to their little brothers and sisters. This book will spark discussions of how the Lord has led you and guided you throughout your life.

Read More

Published 2021

The Littlest Anchor | Christian Children’s Book | Written & Illustrated by Sharon Olson

Can one tiny anchor secure a ship in the middle of a raging sea or is the Farnsworth and her crew doomed to crash on the rocks? This beautifully illustrated book tells the true story of a ship and her faithful captain who learns that God can use even the littlest of anchors in the most mysterious ways!

Published 2021

The Littlest Anchor | Christian Children’s Book | Written & Illustrated by Sharon Olson

Filled with vibrant paintings, intrepid mice, and a powerful faith building story, this hardcover children’s book is a treasure for kids and adults. Kids will have fun searching the heavy-weight, glossy pages for the mice that sail with the Farnsworth's crew, while all will enjoy the original artwork and the powerful true story of “The Littlest Anchor.”
